title: Today I lost a game because of people who use bots to farm IP
body:
{{champion:412}}   Today I lost a game because of people who use bots to farm IP, its not really a problem in Co-op Vs Ai but it is a REAL problem in everything else.

{{champion:120}}  Riot today I lost this game because there is no way to report this, 'Cheating' does not help your Ai program find these people guilty of using third party programs like this.

{{champion:429}}  Please fix your software, put the players back in charge of the banning. I was not around when you did it, but I heard it use to be a thing and to make this game good again this is the only way.

{{champion:30}}  An Ai can not see these issues, nor will they be able to properly see whose wrong and whose right in flame wars.

{{champion:56}}  You can't just slap a Ai program in and think its ok, no your killing us.

{{champion:60}}  I'm so disappointed from my last game, because I know that person won't be punished... I know you guys won't read this and I know nothing will ever be done...

{{champion:57}}  So whatever, enjoy ruining a game I once enjoyed...

replies.body:
The old system was slower to punish people and less successful in detecting false positives. Everyone just clicked punish as soon as they could without reading it.

It is difficult for an automated system to decipher between a real player that just sucks and a bot a lot of the time, so they are usually caught when the account is sold and then, because a new player is on it, their behavior changes.

The old system was worse or equal at detecting this though.

Well this one is not helping either, can't they just hire people to do the reports?

Idk like Blizzard and every other big game? xD

Idk if they still do it, but I remember my friend complaining because WoW banned people based purely off of quantity of reports. So if you didn't like someone you could just get a few people to report them with you and they would be penalized. That what you want?

Not at all, I want people to be punished for the crap they do in the games. Its not a fact that I dont like them its the fact they are allowed to harass lower ranked players and get no punishment because the ai program can not see it.
Was it a bot game? like were the enemy team real people or?

A bot is a program people use to have a crappy ai move about and throw spells that dont make since in lane. They also run into towers and die for no reason.

The fed all game and go in random lanes, its people being too lazy to play games them self.
